original_title: 大好きな婚約者の兄は、昔私を犯し続けた粘着ストーカーだった
overview: Karen is about to get married to her fiance and she gets introduced to the husband’s brother.  Much to her disgrace she already knows the guy, who used to be a stalker. And quickly discovers that this brother is still a scumbag who goes as far as arguing that this coincidence is fate.  Karen ends up keeping silent, to protect her future marriage.
title: My Beloved Fiance’s Older Brother Is The Stalker Who Used To Fuck Me Karen Kaede
